transcript: but most of the things that make great products is 100 golden BB's there's just hundreds of tiny little improvements it's like how can we look at the can how can we improve the way it ships what about the weight what about the color scheme how does it sit on the shelves and it's just a thousand details that someone who does not care will not put the work to look into because they're trying to check a box rather than to make something that people will love and so that's one of the things we have is
